channel.title: New comer, needs help!
channel.description:
Hey guys/girls,
Well today i wanted to make a rsps 525 server. So i downloaded a client and a source. But i found out it was a hmachi server. So i found it a bit difficult to code and see what files a which. So i need help coding shops, Npc's monsters and all that stuff.
Here are the issuses the server has :
1. It has no NPC's.- That means no shops, no nothing. 2. You can't trade in it, or follow - There's 2 walk here selections, instead of follow / walk here. 3. It has thye wildy ditch, But when i go into it i can't get out without teleing or ::nocliping/dieing. 4. Some item's are glitching and i can't spawn. 5.No monsters and when i spawn a NPC eg. Corpi can't attack him. I can't attack any monster or trade and shop keepers.
So that's basically it at the momentihave found out.So if someone could post how to code shops in monsters in, items in and stuff that would be great. BTW i have the ZODIACREGIN LATEST PACK but i don't know what to do with it. - ME :S -
So if someone could send me link to a tut on making a hamachi server that would be great.
Thanks

item.title: New comer, needs help!
item.dc:creator: @drunk_mario drunk mario
item.description:
@drunk_mario wrote:

Start off with a 317, something easier to code. I started off with a delta about 1 week ago maybe and all is easy.

Read full topic

item.title: New comer, needs help!
item.dc:creator: @Under4545 Under4545
item.description:
@Under4545 wrote:

Trust me he is right you should definitly start out on a 317 server, all the files are rite there for you and easy to use. Its pretty basic but still a good start.

Read full topic

item.title: New comer, needs help!
item.dc:creator: @xayden xayden
item.description:
@xayden wrote:

Well i don’t know if it’s hamachi or not, because the dude said download hamachi for it.

But is hamachi servers have different files and stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: New comer, needs help!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

NEVER EVER start on anything but a 317, oh god please, first, you wont be able to do anything and ask simple questions, and we are NOT a spoonfeeding community, and hamachi is horrible, portforwarding is better, trust me, no one will join your server if its hamachi, and if you do not have a router, just use utorrent…
Start on delta imo, its the easiest, then go to PI, and move upwards…

That is all the help you need.

Read full topic

item.title: New comer, needs help!
item.dc:creator: @xayden xayden
item.description:
@xayden wrote:

Hey guys/girls,

Well today i wanted to make a rsps 525 server. So i downloaded a client and a source. But i found out it was a hmachi server. So i found it a bit difficult to code and see what files a which.
So i need help coding shops, Npc’s monsters and all that stuff.

Here are the issuses the server has :

  1. It has no NPC’s.- That means no shops, no nothing.
  2. You can’t trade in it, or follow - There’s 2 walk here selections, instead of follow / walk here.
  3. It has thye wildy ditch, But when i go into it i can’t get out without teleing or ::nocliping/dieing.
  4. Some item’s are glitching and i can’t spawn.
    5.No monsters and when i spawn a NPC eg. Corpi can’t attack him. I can’t attack any monster or trade and shop keepers.

So that’s basically it at the momentihave found out.So if someone could post how to code shops in monsters in, items in and stuff that would be great. BTW i have the ZODIACREGIN LATEST PACK but i don’t know what to do with it. - ME :S -

So if someone could send me link to a tut on making a hamachi server that would be great.

Thanks
